sentences.en: 400,000 square kilometres of the Amazon basin have already been deforested.
sentences.cn: 亚马孙河流域已有40万平方公里的森林遭到滥伐。

sentences.en: A basin of cold water has cured the slut . "
sentences.cn: 一盆冷水 就医 好了!

sentences.en: a wash basin
sentences.cn: 洗脸盆

sentences.en: a yacht basin
sentences.cn: 停放游艇的内港

sentences.en: As he reached the door, he was showered straight on the head with a basin of slops.
sentences.cn: 他走到门口劈头泼来一盆脏水.

sentences.en: countries around the Pacific Basin
sentences.cn: 太平洋盆地周围的国家

sentences.en: Fill the basin with the cake mixture.
sentences.cn: 在盆里装入蛋糕拌料。

sentences.en: He washed his hands in a basin.
sentences.cn: 他在盆里洗了手。

sentences.en: It is moulded into a basin - like form.
sentences.cn: 它被做成盆状.

sentences.en: She tipped the flour into the basin.
sentences.cn: 她把面粉倒进盆里.

sentences.en: the Amazon basin
sentences.cn: 亚马孙河流域

sentences.en: The basin favours the development of farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.cn: 这个盆地有利于农业和畜牧业的发展.

sentences.en: The basin fell with a crash.
sentences.cn: 哐的一声,脸盆掉在地上了.

sentences.en: The film begins with an aerial view of the Great Basin of Nevada.
sentences.cn: 影片以空中鸟瞰内华达大盆地的镜头开始。

sentences.en: the Pacific Basin
sentences.cn: 太平洋海盆

sentences.en: The salt basin lay deep in the valley.
sentences.cn: 盐场在深深的山谷中.

sentences.en: The topography of the river's basin has changed significantly since the floods.
sentences.cn: 该河流域的地形自洪水以来发生了显著变化。

sentences.en: The water was even with the rim of the basin.
sentences.cn: 盆里的水与盆边平齐了.

sentences.en: There was already a rim of dark hairs and soap round the basin.
sentences.cn: 洗脸盆边上已经有一圈黑头发和肥皂沫。

sentences.en: We stared at each other across the wash basin.
sentences.cn: 小朋友也穿着好了,我们欠着身隔着水盆相对着.

sentences.en: We were given a basin of water to wash our hands in.
sentences.cn: 有人给了我们一盆洗手的水。
